examples.prompt: A quote by Albert Einstein about the universe

examples.prompt: How to write a blog post in 4 easy steps
Rank the top 5 streaming services on a scale of 1-100

examples.description: Timeline visualization, may have years but not score data

examples.prompt: Chart the population of the world since 1900 by every 5 years
Logos of the top 9 consumer companies
Create a table for the last 10 years of the Superbowl including year, winner, loser, quarterbacks and score

custom.prompt: Create a ranking table of the top 3 programming languages in 2024. Include columns for Language Name and Popularity Score (1-100)
custom.description: Custom deterministic prompt for reliable testing
